content:
Experience everything that makes NYC buzz! Join us at OYO Times Square, where you’ll be less than half a block from Times Square, the Theater District and Fifth Avenue, three blocks from Restaurant Row, and four from Rockefeller Center. Walk just a bit further and you’re at the Empire State Building, Central Park, and Greenwich Village.

OYO Times Square welcomes guests of all abilities. Our property descriptions aim to allow any visitor to make an informed decision on whether the hotel is an appropriate choice for their needs. For more information, please see our Accessibility Statement.
